nodes.label: CMS Root Node

attrs.name: CMS Root
attrs.description: The root of the CMS hierarchy

nodes.text: This is the root node of the CMS experiment graph.

nodes.label: Tier0 Operations
nodes.text: Tier0 is responsible for the creation and permanent storage of CMS RAW data.

nodes.label: Data Management
nodes.text: Data Management (DM) team is responsible for data related matters such data access, data transfer, management of disk and tape storages etc.

nodes.label: Production & Reprocessing
nodes.text: Production and Reprocessing (P&R) team is responsible for the central production of MC data as well as the re-processing of the detector data.
